description:
Traction that’s good for the sole. Blundstone has partnered with Vibram to evolve their classic boots. The All-Terrain line has all the comfort that you expect from these Australian icons, but with a bespoke Vibram tread.

  • Uppers are weatherproof nubuck leather, seamlessly fused to the soles for resilient construction
  • Supple leather lining makes it easy to slip these boots on and off
  • Vibram® outsoles are slip-resistant and wear a proprietary lugged pattern to keep you planted in challenging conditions
  • Polyurethane midsole and SPS strike zones provide all-day support and shock absorption
  • Insoles are removeable, washable, and have an antimicrobial finish
  • Pull loops for extra leverage
  • Round toe, medium width
  • These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size
name: Blundstone All-Terrain 2055 Boots - Unisex
